name: Curilla
abilities: If a ~Job Knight~ Forward other than Curilla you control is dealt damage less than its power, the damage becomes 0 instead.

When Curilla enters the field, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Play up to 2 ~Job Knight~ with a total cost of 4 or less among them onto the field and return the other cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.
